Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 倉 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 倉 [ cāng ] granary, barn; cabin, berth
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①(鸧鹒)黄鹂鸟。
②(鸧鸹)灰鹤。

鶬字的基本解释

鶬
cāng

鶬
qiāng
均见“??”。

鶬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cāng］
［《廣韻》七岡切，平唐，清。］
“鸧1”的繁体字。
(1)即鸧鸹。
(2)鸟名。即黄鹂。参见“鶬鶊”。
(3)鸟名。鶂。
(4)传说中的怪鸟。
[②]［qiāng］
［《集韻》千羊切，平陽，清。］
“鸧2”的繁体字。
(1)以金为饰。
(2)通“鏘”。参见“鶬2鶬”。
(3)通“蹌”。参见“鶬2鶬”。

鶬字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶬； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1495第36
【唐韻】七岡切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】千剛切，?音倉。水鳥也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶬，麋鴰。【郭註】今呼鶬鴰。【疏】鶬，一名麋鴰。【司馬相如·子虛賦】雙鶬下。【正義曰】鶬似鴈而黑。【韓詩外傳】鶬胎生也。【正字通】鶬大如鶴，靑蒼色，亦有灰色者，長頸高脚，頂無丹，兩頰紅。關西呼鴰鹿，山東呼鶬鴰，南人呼爲鶬雞，江人呼爲麥雞。又鶬鶊，鳥名。本作倉。【詩·豳風】有鳴倉庚。又奇鶬。【郭璞·江賦】龍鯉一角，奇鶬九頭。又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?千羊切，音鏘。【詩·商頌】八鸞鶬鶬。【鄭箋】聲和也。又【詩·周頌】鞗革有鶬。【毛詩】言有法度也。【鄭箋】金飾貌。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cāng］
["Guangyun" Qigang cut, Ping Tang, Qing. ]
Traditional characters for "鸧1".
(1) The partridge.
(2) The name of the bird. The oriole. See "鶬鶊".
(3) The name of the bird. Bei.
(4) The legendary strange bird.
[②]［qiāng］
["Jiyun" Thousand Sheep Cuts, Pingyang, Qing Dynasty. ]
"鸧2" in traditional characters.
(1) Decorated with gold.
(2) Through "Qiang". See "鶬2鶬".
(3) Through "stomach". See "鶬2鶬".
鶬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶬; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1495 Page 36
[Tang Yun] Qigang Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Qiangang cut, sound storehouse. Waterfowl also. [Erya·Shiniao] 鶬, moose. [Guo's Note] Today, we call the rusty cormorant. [Sparse] 鶬, a moose. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】Shuangjingxia. [Justice] It looks like a wild goose but black. [Han Shiwai Biography] Viviparous birth. [Zhengzitong] The 鶬 is as big as a crane, pale, or gray, with a long neck and high feet, no red at the top, and red cheeks. Guanxi hululu, Shandong hululu, southerners call it 鶬鸹, and Jiang people call it maiji. Also 鶬鶊, the name of the bird. This is a warehouse. 【Poetry·Binfeng】There is Ming Canggeng. And strange. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] A corner of a dragon carp, with nine heads. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? Thousands of sheep cut, sound is sound. 【Poetry·Commercial Song】Eight Luan 鶬鶬. [Zheng Jian] Sheng He Ye. Also 【Poetry·Song of Zhou】Han Ge has a scorpion. [Mao Poems] There are ways to speak. [Zheng Jian] The appearance of gold ornaments.
鶬
